alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 11:02PM EDT until April 09 at 3:01AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek At Breakabeen. * WHEN...From Friday morning to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Minor flood stage. Water begins to overflow into riverfront fields. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 11.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.6 feet on 11/09/1996. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Breakabeen Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Thu 10 pm: 7.7 Forecast: Fri 2 am 9.4 Fri 8 am 10.5 Fri 2 pm 11.5 Fri 8 pm 11.3 Sat 2 am 9.5 Sat 8 am 7.7 Sat 2 pm 6.6 Sat 8 pm 6.1 Sun 2 am 5.8 Sun 8 am 5.5 Sun 2 pm 5.2 &&
